result.eng: We were exhausted by the time we reached the town.
result.ga: bhí muid traochta faoin am a shroich muid an baile
result.orig: bhí muid traochta faoin am a shroich muid an baile
result.html: bhí muid traochta faoin am a shroich muid an baileWe were exhausted by the time we reached the town.
result.ponchtml: ḃí muid traoċta faoin am a ẛroiċ muid an baileWe were exhausted by the time we reached the town.

result.eng: By the time I had reached the destination I was tired.
result.ga: faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse orm
result.orig: faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse orm
result.html: faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse ormBy the time I had reached the destination I was tired.
result.ponchtml: faoin am a ẛroiċ mé an ceann scríbe ḃí tuirse ormBy the time I had reached the destination I was tired.

result.eng: He was made king when he reached 18 years of age.
result.ga: rinneadh rí de nuair a shroich sé 18 mbliana d'aois
result.orig: rinneadh rí de nuair a shroich sé 18 mbliana d'aois

result.ponchtml: rinneaḋ rí de nuair a ẛroiċ sé 18 mbliana d'aoisHe was made king when he reached 18 years of age.
